titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Local Resolution Eligibility Decision Outcome Communicated to Patient Date (Nhs Continuing Healthcare) - Description

div.p: Local Resolution Eligibility Decision Outcome Communicated To Patient Date (NHS Continuing Healthcare) is an ACTIVITY DATE TIME.

Local Resolution Eligibility Decision Outcome Communicated To Patient Date (NHS Continuing Healthcare) is the date the local resolution eligibility decision outcome for NHS Continuing Healthcare was communicated in writing to the PATIENT.
